# Figuruing out CMR in `unmarked`

Install and load `unmarked`
```{r}
install.packages("unmarked")
library(unmarked)
```

Open the vignette from unmarked about capture-mark-recapture
```{r}
vignette("cap-recap", package = "unmarked")
```
